RelatedSentence: PAWTUCKET , R.I. - The 73 - year - old man with the smile and tanned face who got out of the Tacoma truck Monday morning in front of the Pawtucket Fire Station Monday was nothing like the man firefighter David Reed had faced in the days just before Christmas in 2012 .

RelatedSentence: He was off duty at a Christmas concert at Emanuel Episcopal Church in Newport when he heard a man gasping for breath .
